name: Bhediya: The Inner Beast
description:
Bhediya: The Inner Beast is a unique twist to the endless runner genre. The game is set in the mysterious world of Dinesh Vijan’s third installment  in his horror-comedy universe, Bhediya. 

Explore this dramatic world by Running through the mesmerising forest and Avoiding the obstacles.

Keep your eyes peeled during the Full Moon nights when you transform into the mythical shape-shifting Werewolf. Leap over enemies and obstacles to avoid getting caught.

Make sure you collect as many Injections as you can along the way to dominate the Leaderboard.

Top the leaderboard to win 2 Premium 3d Tickets for Bhediya. The event ends on the 25th of November 2022.

Controls: 

Press/ Hold “A” - Move Left 

Press/ Hold “D” - Move Right 

Press “Space” - Jump over obstacles (only in wolf mode)
